hero.title: Elevating your story with professional media

services.aboutUsP1: Empowering passionate stories through creative, professional filmmaking.
services.aboutUsP2: At Winglam Productions our mission is to empower people to share their passion in life, and we are there to elevate it by bringing it to life on screen. We believe every story is unique and deserves to be told with creativity and professionalism ✨
services.lifestyleDesc: Capture the authentic rhythm of everyday life
services.photoshootDesc: Professional on-location photo shoots, including candid photos and short hero shots.

brand.title: Brand Story Elevation
brand.shortDesc: A punchy, cinematic film that distils your brand DNA into a compelling 1.5-2 minute story. Perfect for website hero banners and ad pre‑roll.
brand.pageTitle: Brand Story Elevation: Making Your Brand Impactful
brand.pageDescription: Today, attention moves at the speed of a swipe. Our Brand Story Elevation Service turns your restaurant’s personality, craft, and atmosphere into scroll-stopping video and photo content that looks, feels, and tastes like your brand. From a single half-day shoot to a multi-location cinematic production, each tier below is built to give you exactly the volume, polish, and strategic guidance you need.

socialSpark.name: Social Spark
socialSpark.perfectFor: Ideal for showcasing your brand with a focused content package.

production.item1: 1 × half day shoot (≈ 4-5 hours, one location)

choice1.label: Choose one of the following:
choice1.optionA: 1 x flagship brand film (≈ 2 minutes long)
choice1.optionB: 5 x social media reels (≈ 20-30 seconds long)

serviceFeatures.item2: 3 working days delivery (after day of filming)

proMomentum.name: Pro Momentum
proMomentum.perfectFor: For a comprehensive brand narrative and social media presence.

production.item1: 1 × full day shoot (≈ 7-8 hours, one location)

deliverables.item1: 1 x flagship brand film ≈ 2 minutes long
deliverables.item2: 3 x social media reels (≈ 20-30 seconds long)

serviceFeatures.item2: 5 working days delivery (after day of filming)

contentMomentum.name: Content Momentum
contentMomentum.perfectFor: Ultimate content creation for maximum impact across multiple platforms.

production.item1: full days shoots (≈ 7-8 hours, multiple locations)

deliverables.item2: 5 x social media reels (≈ 20-30 seconds long)

serviceFeatures.item2: 7 working days delivery (after day of filming)

lifestyle-event-showcase.title: Lifestyle / Event Showcase
lifestyle-event-showcase.shortDesc: We capture authentic, aspirational day‑in‑the‑life footage to connect your product with the lifestyle your audience dreams of.
lifestyle-event-showcase.pageTitle: Lifestyle & Event Showcase: Capturing Authentic Moments
lifestyle-event-showcase.pageDescription: Showcase the vibrant lifestyle your brand embodies or the unforgettable atmosphere of your events. We craft compelling visual narratives that connect with your audience on an emotional level.

essentialLifestyle.name: Essential Lifestyle Package
essentialLifestyle.perfectFor: Small brands or events needing a concise, impactful showcase.

comprehensiveEvent.name: Comprehensive Event Coverage
comprehensiveEvent.perfectFor: Larger events or campaigns needing extensive footage.

dynamic-photoshoot.title: Dynamic Photoshoot
dynamic-photoshoot.shortDesc: Professional on-location photoshoots including live photos and short form hero shots. Perfect for capturing dynamic images of individuals or products.
dynamic-photoshoot.pageDescription: Our Dynamic Photoshoot service offers flexible on-location photography. We specialize in creating vibrant images, including live photos and short hero shots, tailored to your needs. Please note that specific packages and pricing are being finalized. Contact us for a custom consultation.

starterOnLocation.name: Starter On-Location Shoot
starterOnLocation.perfectFor: Individuals or small businesses looking for a quick, professional photoshoot.

strategy.item1: Consultation to define shoot goals and location specifics

deliverables.item1: Set of professionally edited digital images
deliverables.item2: Online gallery for viewing and downloading photos
deliverables.item3: Includes a selection of live photos and short form hero shots

serviceFeatures.item2: Travel within Amsterdam included (additional travel may incur extra cost)

wedding-films.title: Wedding Films
wedding-films.shortDesc: From bridal prep to dance‑floor, every tear & laugh wrapped into a timeless highlight film—delivered in beautiful 4K HDR.
wedding-films.pageTitle: Cinematic Wedding Films: Your Love Story, Beautifully Told
wedding-films.pageDescription: Preserve the magic of your wedding day with a breathtaking cinematic film. We capture every emotion, from the intimate moments of preparation to the joyous celebration on the dance floor, delivering a timeless keepsake in stunning 4K HDR.

highlightReel.name: Highlight Reel Package
highlightReel.perfectFor: Capturing the essence of your special day.

featureFilm.name: Feature Film Package
featureFilm.perfectFor: A comprehensive story of your wedding day.

serviceDetailPage.noPackages.title: Detailed packages are on their way!
serviceDetailPage.noPackages.description: We're crafting the perfect options for this service. In the meantime, please reach out for a custom consultation.

showcase.comingCtaCopy: Excited about our upcoming {{cat}} services? Let’s discuss how we can tailor them for you.

webDesign.label: WebDesign By Hand
webDesign.desc: Our client requested an impactful flagship film of their web-design business.
webDesign.p2: Full day shoot with gimbal & slider

bbq.label: Keanu BBQ Event
bbq.desc: A memorable lifestyle film capturing the warmth of a special BBQ event.
bbq.p1: Capture unique atmosphere and key moments

comingSoon.desc: High-energy snack-size clips optimised for Reels & TikTok, boosting reach 2×.
comingSoon.p1: Vertical framing from capture to delivery
comingSoon.p2: Caption & hashtag research for maximum lift

comingSoon.desc: An intimate cinematic recap capturing every emotion of your big day.
comingSoon.p1: Full-day coverage from prep to finale
comingSoon.p3: Drone establishing shots of the venue

about.title: Our Story, Passion & Purpose
about.subTitle: Our Mission
about.mission: We exist to empower passionate stories through the craft of professional filmmaking. Every project—whether a 60 second brand film or a feature‑length documentary—gets the same dedication: cinematic visuals, compelling narrative, and an obsession with detail that leaves audiences wanting more. From concept to final delivery, we collaborate closely with clients to make sure the heart of their message sings on screen.

contactPage.title: Let’s make your story
contactPage.description: Drop us a line, book a discovery call, or just say hi—we’re always keen to chat about stories worth telling.
contactPage.errorRequired: Please fill in all required fields.
contactPage.legendServices: What services are you interested in?

reasons.qualify: Save time & qualify leads in sales process
reasons.awareness: Increase brand awareness on social media

contactPage.budgetNote: On average, most of our video projects sit between €500 – €1 000 excl. tax
